Blog

Who I Am

Experienced User Interface Engineer

I'm a passionate UI/UX Designer and Front-End Developer creating modern and responsive designs for Web Apps.

Visual Designing

Artworks and illustrations were my gateway to the creative industry, where I started my professional career as a Graphic Designer at Views World (PVT) ltd, the first step in the digital world.

Font-End Developing

Starting with graphic designing several years ago and I found myself working as a Web Designer for complex projects with a holistic approach soon. Visually appealing designs, subtle details and brand guidelines combined to innovative interfaces across various touch points became my daily companion.

UX Engineering

Out of this love for aesthetic design my passion for functionality and structure evolved. Jumping right into Photoshop didn’t feel accurate anymore and skipping the steps of building a framework based on functionality and usability became inevitable.

And years of User Interface engineering and desiging experiance with various of projects let me to the path user experience designing along with my career at started at WSO2 inc. where I found my self more of a costomer experience consultation.
